original_text: For I have come to set a man against his father, and a daughter against her mother, and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law.
korean_text: 내가 온 것은 사람이 그 아버지와, 딸이 어머니와, 며느리가 시어머니와 불화하게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: to set a man against his father
and a daughter against her mother
and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law
